articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Institutes
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Institutes

					Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a gift from the China Institutes of Contemporary International Relations.
					
					The gift was handed to an official concerned on Monday by its Vice-President Wang Zaibang on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets UK Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets UK Ambassador

					Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, on Monday met and had a talk with Peter Hughes, British ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets British Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets British Ambassador

					Pyongyang, September 19 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK met and had a talk with Peter Hughes, British ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him Monday.
